    • Constructor Detail

      • GUIGameRunner

        public GUIGameRunner()
        This is the constructor of the GUI. Here the frame, all the panels, labels and buttons are created. Moreover the setup of the game is made, which includes drawing of 2 cards for the player and 2 cards for the dealer, but the second one of the dealer is left invisible to the player until the it is time for the dealer to play.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • giveColor

        public void giveColor()
        This method simply gives background color to all the panels. The color I have chosen is green, because most casino tables for blackjack are green.

      • createButtons

        public void createButtons()
        This method creates the buttons and is used by the constructor method.

      • busted

        public void busted()
        This method is evoked when the player is busted.

      • editLabelScore

        public void editLabelScore(javax.swing.JLabel label)
        This method adds the label, which is passed to it to the panel and then the panel is added to the frame to avoid glitches. This is the display of the score of the player.
        Parameters:
        label - the score of the player.

      • editLabelDScore

        public void editLabelDScore(javax.swing.JLabel label)
        This method adds the label, which is passed to it to the panel and then the panel is added to the frame to avoid glitches. This is the display of the score of the dealer.
        Parameters:
        label - the score of the dealer.

      • dealerDraw

        public void dealerDraw()
        This is the method, which is responsible for the drawing of all the dealer cards and basically it is dealer playing the game.

      • checkScore

        public boolean checkScore()
        This method checks the score and basically applies the rules of blackjack.
        Returns:
        boolean whether to play on or stop.

      • createFields

        public void createFields()
        This method creates all the fields like labels, imageIcons, Label images and adds everything to the panel. This method is used by the constructor and when the new round is about to begin.

      • checkBlackjack

        public void checkBlackjack()
        This method checks if the player has got a blackjack and directly moves on to the dealer drawing the cards. Moreover it outputs in the console a text if the player has a blackjack.

      • createLabelImage

        public void createLabelImage(Card card,
                             boolean isPlayer)
        This method is used to create the label images and then display them to the user.
        Parameters:
        card - Card to be displayed
        isPlayer - in which panel(the player one or the dealer one the card to be displayed in)

      • idToIndex

        public int idToIndex(java.lang.String id)
        This method converts the id to index, which is then used to find the position of the card in the deck.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the cards with first symbol the symbol for the color(C,D,H,S) and then the number of the card(1-13)
        Returns:
        the index of the card in the deck.

      • createBoard

        public void createBoard()
        This method creates the board on which the game will be played.

      • shuffleDecks

        public void shuffleDecks()
        This method shuffles the decks.

      • createForm

        public void createForm()
        This method sets up the whole environment of the GUI. The main panels and positions them in the right order.

      • initializeIndexOfCardLbls

        public void initializeIndexOfCardLbls()
        This method initializes the index of the card labels.

      • createCardLabel

        public void createCardLabel(javax.swing.ImageIcon icon)
        This method creates a label for the card to be added to. It is first inserted and constructed as a tempLbl and then it is added to the ArrayList of labels. The right picture of the card in taken as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        icon - the picture, which corresponds to the card, which is to be shown.

      • createImages

        public void createImages()
        This method creates all the images of all the cards, which are then to be used in labels.

      • showCardLabel

        public void showCardLabel(boolean isPlayer)
        This method is responsible for the displaying of a label, which will contain a specific image for the specific card. The thing about this method is that if the cards on the table are more than 10 for the player they will shrink, so that all the cards can fit. One more shrink will be performed if the player draws 15 cards, which I have to say would happen really rarly, but nevertheless there is such a chance! (6 decks= 24 aces, if the player draws 10 aces, then one 2 and then 8 aces he will have 19 cards on the table and 20 points, so if he decided that he will get one more ace and draws again, regardless of what he gets he will have 20 cards on the table. Thus we need a way to handle 20 cards on the table.
        Parameters:
        isPlayer - shows if it is the player or the dealer.

      • checkFinalScore

        public void checkFinalScore()
        This is the method that decides the outcome of the game and displays the corresponding message to the user. Moreover it asks the user if s/he wants to continue and allows him/her to do that.

      • winAnswer

        public void winAnswer()
        This method is used to display the message in the player wins.

      • decideOutcome

        public void decideOutcome()
        This method is used to determine if the player wanted to play more or not and the corresponding action is done. If s/he wants to play the game is restarted, if s/he doesn't want to play, then a goodbye message is shown.

      • resetGame

        public void resetGame()
        This method restarts all the labels and counters and ArrayLists, which needs to be cleared and restarted in order for the player to be able to play again.

      • clearLbls

        public void clearLbls()
        This method is part of the cleaning up after the game has ended. It removes all the labels and clears up before the new round begin.

      • clearPanels

        public void clearPanels()
        This method is part of the cleaning up after the game has ended. It removes all the panels which need to be removed and clears up before the new round begin.

      • clearScores

        public void clearScores()
        This method uses a method in board to clear up the scores of the player and the dealer.

      • enableBtns

        public void enableBtns()
        This method enables the button as they were disabled in the end of the last round.

      • addAll

        public void addAll()
        This method just lets the game be constructed and start again.
